name: Piña Colada Flaca
description: A lighter version of the classic, this cocktail uses coconut water ice cubes in lieu of all that thick coconut milk.
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces golden aged rum (not spiced) such as Pyrat XO Reserve

recipeInstructions.text: Freeze the coconut water in an ice cube tray.
Place three coconut water ice cubes in a tumbler. Add rum and pineapple juice and stir gently. Carefully pour the coconut milk onto the top of the drink.
